DOC.brief_summary: To investigate dose-response of Rapid Acting Intramuscular Olanzapine in Agitated Patients with Schizophrenia
DOC.brief_title: A Study Using Rapid Acting Intramuscular Olanzapine in Agitated Patients With Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Patients must have schizophrenia that meets disease diagnostic criteria in DSMIVTR Patients must be inpatients during the study Patients must have a minimum total score of no less than 14 on the five items of the PANSSEC and at least one individual item score of no less than 4 using the 17 scoring system prior to the first injection of study drug Patients who have a known history of diabetes mellitus. Patients who have received treatment with antipsychotics or other prohibited concomitant medicines within 2 hours prior to the first IM study drug administration Patients who have had treatment with benzodiazepines within 4 hours prior to first IM study drug administration.
